subtitleNullable: Sybilbots Dataset absorbed from Twitter in Different phases
descriptionNullable:
This dataset is representing a set of 3,600 previously detected political bots on Twitter. you will find different files starting from the source raw files before applying any NLP techniques ending with NLP processed files.  

SOURCES:- 

The Main Source File was a simple dataset file obtained from Botometer (a Twitter tool used to detect bots) - the file was only having 1 column which is the Twitter IDs of the already confirmed political bots (fake Twitter accounts)

COLLECTION METHODOLOGY:-

We did use the original file obtained from Botometer to get the IDs then we did use the Twitter developer API to absorb data and features for each bot account.
title: Sybil-Bots-Dataset
